name: The Flex Tournament
description:
This visual novel follows the journey of Ray, Ciara, and Adriana as they compete in the worlds largest virtual reality tournament. Join them and help shape their story as they battle to way through The Flex tournament. 

This game is choice based novel were the player can choose the path of the characters. 

This game is a prototype. I don't own any of the art or music. This game was made with the renpy program coded and designed by Michael E. Harris Jr.
